pull.title: refactor: Use AutoFile and HashVerifier (without ser-type and ser-version) where possible
pull.body:
This was done in the context of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25284 , but I think it also makes sense standalone.

The basic idea is that serialization type should not be initialized when it is not needed. Same for the serialization version.

So do this here for `AutoFile` and `HashVerifier`. `CAutoFile` and `CHashVerifier` remain in places where it is not yet possible.

events.body: Obviously not against getting this merged, but I think I'd have been more comfortable with another ACK? Perhaps someone can have a look here post-merge? Not a huge overhaul, but also not as trivial as a docs change.

comments.body: `CHashVerifier` will (might) be removed anyway, so I think temporarily having 10 lines of additional code should be fine for now
Thanks, will do on the next push, if there is one.
Fair point, can be marked resolved.
My preference would be to do it for all functions in the same commit: `git grep 'void read(Span<'`
